<title>David  Cañada</title>

  <script async="" src="https://tags.refinery89.com/procyclingstats.js"></script><meta name="description" content="David Cañada (born 1975-03-11 in Zaragoza, passed away 2016-05-28) was a former professional road racing cyclist from Spain, active between 1993 and 2008. His best results are winning GC Volta a Catalunya and winning GC Vuelta a la Región de Murcia .">

<div class="titleCont "><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag es w32"></span><span class="flag c24 es "></span> <h1>David  Cañada</h1></div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>

</ul>
</div>
</div>
